mapper.select: SELECT DAY_OF_MONTH(sessionDate) AS "day", COUNT(*) AS lessonCount FROM pt_session WHERE sessionDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY DAY_OF_MONTH(sessionDate)

SELECT s.sessionId AS sessionId, s.memberId AS memberId, s.packageId, m.name AS memberName, u.name AS trainerName, s.sessionDate, s.sessionTime, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM attendance a WHERE a.sessionId = s.sessionId AND a.memberId = s.memberId ) AS attended, (select a.status from attendance a where a.sessionId = s.sessionId AND a.memberId = s.memberId ) AS status FROM pt_session s JOIN member m ON s.memberId = m.memberId JOIN app_user u ON s.trainerId = u.userId WHERE s.sessionDate = #{sessionDate} ORDER BY s.sessionTime ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pt_session (memberId, trainerId, packageId, sessionDate, sessionTime) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{trainerId},#{packageId}, #{sessionDate}, #{sessionTime} )
